name: Tanager Wreath
description: Grants %b50%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Brutality Category.
flavor: "Crafted out of bloody sticks and guts, this wreath calls on the Entity's blessing for more blood."

name: Devout Tanager Wreath
description: Grants %b75%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Brutality Category.
flavor: "Devoutly crafted out of sticks and guts, this wreath calls on the Entity's blessing for more blood."

name: Ardent Tanager Wreath
description: Grants %b100%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Brutality Category.
flavor: "Crafted with a fiery, undying passion out of bloody sticks and guts, this wreath calls on the Entity's blessing for more blood."

name: Raven Wreath
description: Grants %b50%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
flavor: "Crafted out of blackened branches and coals, this wreath calls on the Entity's blessing for more blood."

name: Devout Raven Wreath
description: Grants %b75%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
flavor: "Devoutly crafted out of blackened branches and coals, this wreath calls on the Entity's blessing for more blood."

name: Ardent Raven Wreath
description: Grants %b100%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
flavor: "Crafted with a fiery, undying passion out of blackened branches and coals, this wreath calls on the Entity's blessing for more blood."

name: Spotted Owl Wreath
description: Grants %b50%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Hunting Category.
flavor: "Crafted out of sharp metals, ropes and feathers, this wreath calls on the Entity's blessing for more blood."

name: Devout Spotted Owl Wreath
description: Grants %b75%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Hunting Category.
flavor: "Crafted out of sharp metals, ropes and feathers, this wreath calls on the Entity's blessing for more blood."

name: Ardent Spotted Owl Wreath
description: Grants %b100%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Hunting Category.
flavor: "Crafted with a fiery, undying passion out of sharp metals, ropes and feathers, this wreath calls on the Entity's blessing for more blood."

name: Shrike Wreath
description: Grants %b50%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Sacrifice Category.
flavor: "Crafted out of sticks, strings and bones, this wreath calls on the Entity's blessing for more blood."

name: Devout Shrike Wreath
description: Grants %b75%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Sacrifice Category.
flavor: "Devoutly crafted out of sticks, strings and bones, this wreath calls on the Entity's blessing for more blood."

name: Ardent Shrike Wreath
description: Grants %b100%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in the Sacrifice Category.
flavor: "Crafted with a fiery, undying passion out of sticks, strings and bones, this wreath calls on the Entity's blessing for more blood."

name: Hollow Shell
description: Grants %b25%/b% extra Bloodpoints in all Categories.
flavor: "An unidentifiable cocoon which was breached by whatever was inside."

name: Survivor Pudding
description: Grants %b100%/b% bonus Bloodpoints in all Categories.
flavor: "A heavily salted pudding..."

name: Cut Coin
description: Calls on the Entity to prevent the appearance of %b2%/b Chests.
flavor: "Two halves of a thick metallic coin."

name: Scratched Coin
description: Calls on the Entity to prevent the appearance of %b1%/b Chest.
flavor: "A defaced coin of unknown origin."

name: Moldy Oak
description: Calls on the Entity to create %b1%/b more Hook.
flavor: "A damp and decaying piece of oak replete with mold."

name: Rotten Oak
description: Calls on the Entity to create %b2%/b more Hooks.
flavor: "A decomposing piece of oak in which strange markings have been etched."

name: Putrid Oak
description: Calls on the Entity to create %b3%/b more Hooks.
flavor: "A ruined piece of oak oozing with a black putrescent liquid."

name: Cypress Memento Mori
description: Grants the ability to %bkill the last Survivor%/b by your hand during the next trial.
flavor: "You worked well, the last one is yours."

name: Ivory Memento Mori
description: Grants the ability to %bkill one survivor%/b who has been hooked by your hand during the next trial.
flavor: "Grant me the favour of killing one."

name: Ebony Memento Mori
description: Grants the ability to %bkill all Survivors%/b who have been hooked by your hand during the next trial.
flavor: "I could swear It spoke to the beast. It came to a halt, as if calmly listening to the leaves rustling, and then... grinned."

name: Shroud of Separation
description: All Survivors start the trial separated.
flavor: "A thin black shroud which is falling apart."
